hero.heading: Awaken Your Productivity
hero.paragraph: In everything we do, we believe in the productivity and coffee of Guatemala. Our coffee is gourmet because it comes from a single origin. We make it easy to order coffee for your home, business, or office.

supporting1.order_description: Enter your details and address to receive.
supporting1.mission_quote: “Our mission is simple: Help awaken the productivity of Guatemalans with our exclusive gourmet coffee.”

testimonial.testimonial1_text: This coffee is absolutely delicious. It has an exquisite aroma and tastes mmmmmm.... I love it! 100% recommended!
testimonial.testimonial2_text: I love the vibe of the brand. And the taste of the coffee even more!
testimonial.testimonial3_text: The best coffee I've had in years.

referEarn.title: REFER AND EARN Q500
referEarn.description: Do you know any business or office that might be interested in our coffee? Refer us to your contact, you will earn Q500 and your referral will get 50% off on their first order.

home.bio_1_heading: We meet the needs of your business or office
home.bio_1_description: We offer special services and pricing for wholesalers. Benefit from our special shipping rates.
home.bio_2_heading: Don Lucas used to wake up every day at 4 a.m.
home.bio_2_description: It is said that Don Lucas and Doña Mary used to wake up every day at 4 a.m. to work the fields and have a productive and successful day.
home.bio_3_heading: Committed to supporting education in Guatemala
home.bio_3_description: Every month, we send 10% of our profits to different organizations that support education in Guatemala. This effort aims to help provide access to education in Guatemala.

about.heading: Origins
about.paragraph: Don Lucas was a productive, hardworking, and charitable man who began this coffee tradition from scratch with his wife Doña Mary over 60 years ago.
about.bio_1_description: Don Lucas was born in the municipality of San Rafael P.C. San Marcos, Guatemala. He grew up in a low-income family with little education, but he exceeded all expectations.
about.bio_2_description: He started by carrying 100-pound sacks on his own back, then saved to buy a horse to carry more sacks. Over time, he had the opportunity to buy his first agricultural truck on credit, thanks to a close friend who owned a nearby farm called Las Cruces.
about.bio_3_description: The problem was that Don Lucas didn’t know how to drive, so his friend offered to sell him the truck along with driving lessons from his driver.

coffee.heading: Our Coffee
coffee.paragraph: Gourmet, single-origin coffee, harvested on the slopes of the Tajumulco volcano. High-grade, first-harvest beans. Packaged in a biodegradable bag. Yields up to 60 cups per pound.
coffee.bio_1_description: We offer special services and prices for wholesalers. Benefit from our special shipping rate and schedule your reorder point today!
coffee.bio_2_description: We customize our coffee to pair best with your preferred coffee method. Want a specific recommendation for your brewing method? Send us a message.
coffee.bio_3_description:
Altitude: 1,100/1,200 m a.s.l.
Region: San Rafael P.C. San Marcos, Guatemala.
Variety: Arabica, Caturra.
Process: Washed and sun-dried.
Roast: Custom.
Grind Type: Custom.

charity.heading: Compra1educa1
charity.paragraph: We are committed to donating 10% of our profits to projects supporting education in Guatemala.
charity.bio_1_description: Currently, Casa Guatemala provides education, healthcare services, and nutrition to more than 300 children from 30 Mayan villages in the surrounding area, who otherwise would not have the option to educate their children.
charity.bio_2_description: Casa Guatemala aims to provide quality education, healthy food, and primary healthcare in a loving and safe environment to vulnerable children in the Rural Eastern Region of Guatemala.
charity.bio_3_description: Compra1Educa1: We are committed to donating 10% of our profits to projects that support education in Guatemala.
